item.title: [HBASE-16077] Replication status doesnt show failed RS metrics in CLI
item.description:
Steps to reproduce
================

  1. Create 2 clusters and configure replication
  2. Create TABLE 1 and enable table replication
  3. Shutdown Cluster 2 for short period.
  4. Load data to TABLE 1
  5. Shutdown Region Server whr Region of TABLE 1 is available
  6. Check metrics using CLI
